team.description: Globally unique identifier for the team.

user.description: A string identifying a user. This can either be the string "me", an email, or the gid of a user. This parameter must be used with the workspace parameter.

workspace.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace. This parameter must be used with the user parameter.

opt_fields.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.
